_source: Microsoft Learn - Windows Installer Database Tables

tables.name: ActionText
tables.description: Contains text displayed in progress dialog during installation actions.

tables.name: AdminExecuteSequence
tables.description: Lists actions executed during administrative installation.

tables.name: AdminUISequence
tables.description: Lists actions with UI during administrative installation.

tables.name: AdvtExecuteSequence
tables.description: Lists actions executed during feature advertisement.

tables.name: AdvtUISequence
tables.description: Lists actions with UI during feature advertisement.

tables.name: AppSearch
tables.description: Contains properties used to search for installed applications.

tables.name: Billboard
tables.description: Lists billboards displayed during lengthy actions.

tables.name: Binary
tables.description: Holds binary data such as bitmaps, icons, and executables.

tables.name: BindImage
tables.description: Contains DLLs to bind to executables.

tables.name: CCPSearch
tables.description: Contains file signatures for Compliance Checking Program.

tables.name: Class
tables.description: Contains COM server class registration information.

tables.name: Component
tables.description: Defines components - the atomic installation units.

tables.name: Condition
tables.description: Contains conditional expressions for features and components.

tables.name: ControlCondition
tables.description: Contains conditions that control visibility and state.

tables.name: ControlEvent
tables.description: Contains events published by dialog controls.

tables.name: CreateFolder
tables.description: Lists empty folders to be created during installation.

tables.name: CustomAction
tables.description: Integrates custom code and data into installation.

tables.name: Directory
tables.description: Defines the directory structure for installation.

tables.name: DuplicateFile
tables.description: Lists files to be duplicated during installation.

tables.name: Extension
tables.description: Contains file extension to ProgId mappings.

tables.name: Feature
tables.description: Defines installation features that users can select.

tables.name: FeatureComponents
tables.description: Maps features to their component members.

tables.name: Icon
tables.description: Contains icon files for shortcuts and Add/Remove Programs.

tables.name: IniFile
tables.description: Contains INI file entries to write.

tables.name: InstallUISequence
tables.description: Lists actions with UI during installation.

tables.name: LaunchCondition
tables.description: Contains installation prerequisites that must be met.

tables.name: LockPermissions
tables.description: Contains NTFS permissions for files, folders, and registry keys.

tables.name: Media
tables.description: Describes source media disks for installation files.

tables.name: MIME
tables.description: Contains MIME content type to extension mappings.

tables.name: MoveFile
tables.description: Lists files to be moved or copied during installation.

tables.name: MsiEmbeddedChainer
tables.description: Runs chained installations after main installation.

tables.name: MsiFileHash
tables.description: Contains MD5 file hash for verification.

tables.name: MsiPatchOldAssemblyFile
tables.description: Contains old assembly file information for patching.

tables.name: MsiPatchOldAssemblyName
tables.description: Contains old assembly name information for patching.

tables.name: RemoveFile
tables.description: Lists files to remove during installation or uninstallation.

tables.name: RemoveIniFile
tables.description: Lists INI file entries to remove.

tables.name: ReserveCost
tables.description: Contains disk space reservation for future use.

tables.name: SFPCatalog
tables.description: Contains System File Protection catalog files.

tables.name: TextStyle
tables.description: Contains text formatting styles for dialogs.

tables.name: Verb
tables.description: Contains shell verb commands for extensions.

tables.name: _Columns
tables.description: System table listing all table columns.

tables.name: _Tables
tables.description: System table listing all database tables.

tables.name: _TransformView
tables.description: System table for viewing transform changes.

tables.name: _Validation
tables.description: System table containing column validation rules.
